TopicTitle: BFPS-1, Heavy Lifter and Fuel Guzzler Extrodinaire

Articles.Content:
Ladies and gentlemen, I present to you the solution to... nothing.

The BFPS-1!

It stands for:

Big

Fracking

Piece of

Stupidity

v.1

It has 33 engines firing on takeoff, 30 liquids and 3 solid. The solids eject first, followed by three vectoring engines, followed by the other 27, with 6 after that, then 3, then 1, and then a lunar lander with one engine and eight lander legs for extra stability. And yes, it does make it to the Mun.

![FWuq9.png](http://i.imgur.com/FWuq9.png)

Because, Jeb said so.

It is entirely stock as well. Make sure to use the RCS on takeoff, as it likes to tilt beyond 18,000 meters.
Well, its big. This is a bright side. Does not sounds like a big achievement, but i know how hard to build (and especially, edit, in the process), so its actually is an achievement. Congratz.
Congratulations on making it to the mun!
In theory, you could make it so that it has three times the engines AGAIN, and then launch it from the runway with 99 engines.
